summary: Dr. Julian Pappy Choe, M.D., was found guilty of unprofessional and immoral conduct, as well as sexual misconduct, for making inappropriate comments to female patients during breast examinations. As disciplinary action, he received a reprimand, a $10,000 fine, was placed on one year of probation requiring a professional boundaries course, and is permanently prohibited from treating female patients without a non-family chaperone.
